channel.title: INtravel
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: American’s AAdvantage is now JetSmart’s loyalty program; more flights qualify for AA for miles
item.description: Members of American Airlines AAdvantage have a new option in South America via budget airline JetSmart. AAdvantage members can earn miles — including ...

item.title: 16 ways to earn more Delta SkyMiles, from using credit cards to online shopping

item.title: How TPG staffers are using credit cards to combat high prices

item.title: Android users can upload a digital passport for travel

item.title: 9 best river cruises in Europe
item.description: River cruising in Europe is one of those delightfully slow and easy modes of travel. You’re in a small floating hotel, gliding past castles, vineyards...
